item.title: Help with rune rocks
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

case 2107: if (actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[14] >=85) { addSkillXP((2000 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(451, 1); sendMessage("You mine a rune ore!"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 5; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You need level 85 Mining to mine Rune Ore"); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rune rocks
item.dc:creator: @boysonwheelz boysonwheelz
item.description:
@boysonwheelz wrote:

so im making mining atm and the problem is im trying to make it give u a rune ore and xp which i did but also i cant find out how to make it so u need lvl 85 to mine it cause lvl 1s can mine it right now so heres the code

case 2107: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((2000 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(451, 1); sendMessage("You mine a rune ore!"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 5; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
